description.value: Japu carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: infused moderate acid flasks (2), infused moderate alchemist's fires (2), moderate elixirs of life (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate tanglefoot bags (2).
moderate acid flask, moderate alchemist's fire, greater antidote, moderate bravo's brew, moderate elixir of life, moderate tanglefoot bag, wyvern poison
Japu's bombs that have the splash trait deal 5 splash damage and splash to 10 feet.

Cost 1 batch of infused reagents; EffectJapu creates a single alchemical item from his formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the end of his next turn.
Japu Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.

These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Crafting alchemical item
  • +1 item bonus to attack rolls with bombs

description.label: Description
description.value: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

description.label: Description
description.value:
A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Contains formulas for the following:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Moderate)]{Acid Flask (Moderate)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)]{Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Antidote (Greater)]{Antidote (Greater)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bravo's Brew (Moderate)]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (Moderate)]{Elixir of Life (Moderate)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wyvern Poison]{Wyvern Poison}

description.label: Description
description.value:
The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wyvern Poison]{Wyvern Poison}

description.label: Description
description.value: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
